/changelog/.title: Changelog
/changelog/.content:
have already mentioned changelogs are core mongock they main reason rest components here where implement migration

simple words migration constituted by ordered list changelogs each them represent unit migration this following implications:

  • each change wrapped transaction: when targed database doesn’t provide transaction support manual will take place which run rollback provided user case failure
  • targeted operations such undo upgrade etc changelog unit operation example performing undo operation needs specify changelogid until all reverted
  • only one method changeset other methods complementary executed required ’ll explain later section

implementation

from mongock version 5 changelog annotation deprecated shouldn't used won't removed from code backwards compatibility

please follow recommended approaches depending your use case:

existing changelogs/changesets created prior 5: leave untouched (use with deprecated annotation)

implementing interfaces basicchangelog

from added two interfaces basicchangelog provides minimum required execute changelog changelog extends first interface add methods before rollback explained next sections

order create need these interfeces dependeding needs

more information about adopted change please visit our < href="/faq/">faq section

basicchangelog interface

basicchangelogs basic changeset getid getorder also some optional ones like getauthor isfailfast getsystemversion

methoddescriptionmandatorydefault value
changeset()’s method that represents migration adds perform target system(normally database)yesn/
rollback()changeset ’s during undos operation well rollbacks support transactions implementation highly recommended however developer want implement can left emptyn/
getid()returns changelog’s id stored history table/collection way identify changelog combination fieldand author must unique among changelogsn/
getorder()n/
getauthor()defaultauthor
isfailfast()runner configuration sectionfalse
getsystemversion()0

changelog

this extens providing mandatory methods

method
before()this before changeset won’t part transaction available useful ddl operations engines kind cannot transactionn/
rollbackbefore()before rollbacks rollbacks always executed even transactions available active runs out transaction style="textalign:center">n/

example

note any accepts parameters dependency injections performed constructor level

public class clientinitializerchangelog implements { private final mongotemplate mongotemplate; public clientinitializerchangelog(mongotemplate mongotemplate) { thismongotemplate = mongotemplate; } @override string geid() return "clientinitializer"; getorder() "1"; void before() mongotemplatecreatecollection("clients"); rollbackbefore() mongotemplatedropcollection("clients"); changeset() getclientlist() stream() foreach(client > mongotemplatesave(client clients_collection_name)); rollback() mongotemplatedeletemany(new document()); }

/changeunit/.title: ChangeUnit
/changeunit/.content:
*** wip ***

changeunits are core mongock these classes which developers will implement required migration logic / scripts

classes with @changeunit annotation scanned by mongock execute migration

constituted ordered list changeunits each them represent unit migration this following implications:

  • each change wrapped transaction: when target database doesn’t provide transaction support manual take place run rollback provided user case failure
  • targeted operations such undo upgrade etc changeunit unit operation example performing undo operation needs specify changeunitid until all changeunits reverted
  • only one method marked @execution annotation every execution must accompanied @rollbackexecution other methods complementary executed required covered implementation section

implementation

note: from version 5 have:

  • deprecated changelog favour new changeunit implementation;
  • added annotations are:
– execution:
– rollbackexecution;
– beforeexecution;
– rollbackbeforeexecution;

basicchangeunit provides minimum changeunit changeunit extends first interface add two methods before rollback explained next sections

order create your need interfeces dependeding needs

execution;
rollbackexecution;

beforeexecution;
rollbackbeforeexecution;

more information about reason have adopted change please visit our < href="/faq/">faq section

basicchangeunit interface

basicchangeunits basic main changeset getid getorder also some optional ones like getauthor isfailfast getsystemversion

methoddescriptionmandatorydefault value
changeset()’s method that represents migration here where adds code perform system(normally database)yesn/
rollback()changeset ’s during undos operation well rollbacks support transactions highly recommended however developer want implement can left emptyn/
getid()returns changeunit’s id stored history table/collection way identify changeunit combination fieldand author unique among changeunitsn/
getorder()n/
getauthor()defaultauthor
isfailfast()runner configuration sectionfalse
getsystemversion()0

changeunit

this extens providing mandatory methods

method
before()this before changeset won’t part transaction available useful ddl operations engines kind cannot transactionn/
rollbackbefore()before rollbacks rollbacks always executed even transactions available active runs out transaction style="textalign:center">n/

example

note any accepts parameters dependency injections performed constructor level

public class clientinitializerchangeunit implements { private final mongotemplate mongotemplate; public clientinitializerchangeunit(mongotemplate mongotemplate) { thismongotemplate = mongotemplate; } @override string geid() return "clientinitializer"; getorder() "1"; void before() mongotemplatecreatecollection("clients"); rollbackbefore() mongotemplatedropcollection("clients"); changeset() getclientlist() stream() foreach(client > mongotemplatesave(client clients_collection_name)); rollback() mongotemplatedeletemany(new document()); }

/how-it-works/.title: How it works?
/how-it-works/.content:
mongock essentially migration tool offers many operations ways using main traditional approach use part application’s startup distributed environment where more than one agent can potentially execute migration

goal deploy data code together avoid any inconssistency this obviously implies some challenges that ’ll discuss further sections lets explain how works common scenario

1 scenario

easiest way basic og mongock describe imaginary scenario:
have microservice called clientservice which uses table/collection clients

development new user story requires your application get clients from third party system persist them into database clients table/collection only required once must performed release

another aspect take account clientservice scalled horizontally

2 changes (< href="/changeunit/">changeunit)

first need retrieve database changeunit write code

please visit < href="/changeunit/">changeunit section information

from version 5 changelog annotation deprecated 's been replaced by changeunit

old won't removed backward comptability although its recommended now

rcommended following approach:

existing migrations created prior 5: leave untouched (use with deprecated annotation)

migrations: @changeunit annotation

3 persistent layer href="/driver/">driver)

obviously access database multiple reasons:

  • client just retrieved
  • mongock needs track changelogs executed doesn’t twice
  • mentioned horizontally instance may deployed simultaneously trying same migration prevent this mongock pesimistic lock persisted database
mongock driver contains all information mechanisms acces provides drivers different databases pick relevant us configure provding like target schema etc

please href="/driver/">driver information

4 run migration

once coded our configured driver forthis runner

runner kind orchestator charge environment aspects(framework etc) taking configuration driver orderly manner start until succesfully finalized(although behaviour altered) means fails stops process exits should tried again will continue he left

/quick-start/.title: Quick start
/quick-start/.content:
carryng with our clientservice example lets see how start working mongock

mongock provides different runners from standalone runner(vanila version) springboot other frameworks even have said previous sections cli

even springboot mongock two approaches: via annotation/properties manually builder

this section ’ll explain get started approach which most convenient way

1 add maven dependencies pom

  • first need import mongock’s bom pom forget about managing component’s versions
  • … runner
    runners provides visit < href="/runner/">runner section
  • … finally driver
    drivers please href="/driver/">driver section

this assumes already added relevant spring springdata libraries

2 create changeunit

epxlained migration composed by multiples changeunits each one logic specific change

case are creating changeunit insert some initialization data

note that default wrapped transaction native using database support manually when doesn’t provide transaction support
visit href="/features/transactionsmanualrollbacks/">transaxction section more information

package iomongockexamplesmigration;import iomongockapiannotationsexecution;import iomongockapiannotationschangeunit;import iomongockapiannotationsrollbackexecution;@changeunit(id="clientinitializer" order = "1" author "mongock")public class clientinitializerchange { private final mongotemplate mongotemplate; thirpartyservice thirdpartyservice; public clientinitializerchange(mongotemplate mongotemplate thirdpartyservice) { thismongotemplate thisthirdpartyservice } /** method code **/ @execution void changeset() thirdpartyservicegetdata() stream() foreach(client > mongotemplatesave(client clients_collection_name)); /** meethod mandatory transactions enabled they used undo operation any scenario where option however note avialble rollback ignored @rollbackexecution rollback() mongotemplatedeletemany(new document()); }

3 tell use mongock

although there manual ways setup like builder etc(visit information) going show easiest one just requires annotation entries your properties file

@enablemongock@springbootapplicationpublic app static main(string[] args) new springapplicationbuilder()sources(appclass)run(args); }}

4 find packages classes

mentioned point providing configuration file can done builder well

mongock: migrationscanpackage: iomongockexamplesmigration

5 run application

/runner/springboot/.title: Runner: Springboot
/runner/springboot/.content:
mongock sprinboot runner extension springboot framework providing smoothly experience taking advantage framework’s features

get started with standalone runner

like rest runners springboot runner built from builder each provides class static method builder which returns required builder

mongockspringbootbuilder()

springboot builder: specific methods

setting applicationcontext

application context one key aspects runner mongock retrieves dependencies that are injected changeunits spring profiles etc

 mongockspringbootbuilder() // setspringcontext(springcontext)

setting event publisher

have already mentioned some previous section three events: started success failure explain section below how create listener this events first need provide publisher

building runner

all runners basic buildrunner() can also other complementary methods aspect when using springboot ;s likely use directly proper way following methods wrap execution adds extra functionallity

  • buildapplicationrunner(): applicationrunner instance handles runner’s execution nutshell interface lets execute code after started
  • buildinitializingbeanrunner(): initializingbean instace basically allows beans set before started

builder example

springboot features

profiles

mongock supports @profile annoation

when changeunit annotated @profile will only executed any profiles present annotation contained activeprofiles array

event listener

mentioned failure events

eventdescription
springmigrationstartedeventtriggered just starting migration
springmigrationsuccesseventgetmigrationresult() retrieve migration result currently doesn’t value extended future execution’s result
springmigrationfailureeventgetmigrationresult() object migrationfailedresult returned extract exception produced error getexception()

creating listener

this task easy makes developer needs implement orgspringframeworkcontextapplicationlistener he wants register inject bean context

import iomongockrunnerspringbaseeventsspringmigrationsuccessevent;import orgspringframeworkcontextapplicationlistener;import orgspringframeworkstereotypecomponent;@component { @override public void onapplicationevent(springmigrationsuccessevent event) { systemoutprintln("[event listener] finished successfully"); }}
import iomongockrunnerspringbaseeventsspringmigrationfailureevent;import onapplicationevent(springmigrationfailureevent failures: " + eventgetmigrationresult()getexception()getmessage()); }}

/runner/standalone/.content:
standalone runner vanilla version mongock runner ’s good option when framework used there managing dependency injection properties events etc these features have handled manually
currently only supports builder approach(visit < href="/runner/">runner section more information)

get started with runner

like rest runners standalone runner built from builder each provides class static method builder which returns required builder

mongockstandalonebuilder()

standalone builder: specific methods

injecting your own dependencies

this fearure allows inject dependencies changeunit classes methods directly constructor level intelligent enough handle however need somehow provide dependencies following methods:

  • adddependency(object instance): manually adds used changeunits can retrieved by its type
  • adddependency(string name object name
    • type type this useful multiple same super way force finde type method name

setting event listener

already mentioned some previous section three events: started success failure

eventdescription
migrationstartedeventtriggered just before starting migration
migrationsuccesseventgetmigrationresult() retrieve migration result currently doesn’t any value will extended future execution’s result
migrationfailureeventgetmigrationresult() migrationfailedresult returned extract exception that produced error getexception()
framwework dependencies listner are basically java consumers

    listener) listener)
import iomongockrunnercoreeventmigrationfailureevent;import iomongockrunnercoreeventmigrationstartedevent;import iomongockrunnercoreeventmigrationsuccessevent;public mongockeventlistener { public void onstart(migrationstartedevent event) { systemoutprintln("[event listener] successfully"); } onsuccess(migrationsuccessevent finished onfail(migrationfailureevent failures: " + eventgetmigrationresult()getexception()getmessage()); }}

ecample: everything together

 mongockrunner = mongockstandalonebuilder() setdriver(mongosync4driverwithdefaultlock(mongoclient mongodb_db_name)) addchangelogsscanpackage("comgithubcloudyrockmongockexamplesmigration") setmigrationstartedlistener(mongockeventlistener::onstart) setmigrationsuccesslistener(mongockeventlistener::onsuccess) setmigrationfailurelistener(mongockeventlistener::onfail) adddependency("bean" mybean) buildrunner(); // mongockrunnerexecute();

/runner/.title: Runner
/runner/.content:
have already explained briefly role mongock runner section < href="/howworks/">how ti works essentially mongock runner orchestartor dealing with process logic configuration dependencies framework any environmental aspect ’s glue that puts together all components well decision maker

building runner

order use runner need set by passing configuration(migration package etc) required component like driver dependency such applicationcontext etc

mongock provides two ways setup runner:

  • builder approach which requires user manually builder while first this approach looks less convenient bit more control each type(standalone spring micronaut etc) mongocks specific class static method builder() get into detail section

  • properties approach: depends are using underlying framework basically means few entries properties file mechanism provided running smoothly ilustrate example springboot annotation approach springboot annotating application class( configuration class) running

note that regardless always built builder sometimes sometimes hidden mongock

executing runner

once our properly configured build execute

although builder can provide them basic buildrunner() returns mongockrunner instance interface multiple methods most important one relevant execute()

run manually executing methodexecute() tries take advantage underalying make smoothly possible normally just expose bean takes care

some cases when properties approach don’t even bean providing telling framework(via whatever provides) mongock enough

runners available

all runners( their builders) extension common parent example standalone sprinboot builder share execution mechanisms framework

mongock currently couple runners idea cover least frameworks market

currently have:

  • mongock standalone: vanila version runners mainly used setup mostly features others obviously involvement from specify how while event out box case needs listener inject context reader guess only allows traditional approach
    information visit href="/runner/standalone/">standalone section

  • springboot: specialization framework features profiles events environment injections applicationrunner initializingbean etc both approaches(traditional properties) learn about visiting href="/runner/springboot/">springboot section

  • micronaut: micronaut spring version framework’s approaches this under development will available coming releases
    visit href="/runner/micronaut/">micronaut section information

building time!

when comes separate areas: plain properties injection optional use

building time: setting configuration

/technical-overview/.title: Technical overview
/technical-overview/.content:
this section explains all essential concepts required understand how mongock works its usage

mongock structure

mongock requires 3 components work: changeunits driver runner:

< href="/content/images/architectureuserhldjpg" target="_self">

changeunit

changeunits are your migration classes nutshell where implement database changes they represent unit execution

from version 5 changeunits have replaced changelogsvisit < href="/changeunit/">changeunit href="/changelog/">changelog sections more information

migration

operation taking applying them safely order perform desired changes target system (usually database) ’ll see coming sections there other operations main one operations help management migrations such undo list

change entry

mongock persists database change entry representation this allows tracking status changeunit executions identifying which been executed pending applied

driver

this component represents persistence layer connection type everything that needs persisted(distributed lock entries etc) passed by driver connects type
although initially conceived only mongodb grown now provides drivers nosql well sql

runner

this orchestrates from framework injects runner glue puts together makes work ’s responsible environment aspect(framework etc) takes with smaller components loops executes changeunits

builder

this used build runner relevant configuration tightly coupled runner

/.title: What is Mongock?
/.content:
mongock java based migration tool part your application code allows developers have ownership control over data migrations during deployment process allowing safer distributed systems code changes are shipped together

originally designed mongodb product evolving provide wider suite nosql / sql database compatibility cover other feautures transactional execution use cases that require state management systems

why mongock

our mission enable deploy manage stateful safe reliable manner looking migrating services manner via code mongock best bet

there several features enables project:

  • mongock javabased can import application
  • mongock promotes codefirst approach migrations write scripts wh will ship with code
  • mongock persists db made gain more rollbacks + amazing features
  • most productiongrade solution currently market compatible mongo atlas different versions
  • distributed solid locking mechanism
  • our team offers great support very responsive
  • open source tool operating under apache license 20
  • maintain update regularly
  • currently used by tech companies industries
  • adopted well known frameworks such jhipster scaffolding
  • can together most all frameworks
  • can run standalone projects without depending frameworks
  • great spring framework overall native implementations springboot
get information about our model dev@cloudyrockio​ help walking production

history

mongock began its journey fork from unmantained mongobee repository providing mechanism migrations considered this enhancement critical given importance core feature productionready solution

then invested time supporting ’s adoption enhancing since now shaping expand further capabilities features enabling us migrate safely across any rest apis using mechanism

’d like journey please don’t hesitate < href="mailto:dev@mongockio" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">contact us what thoughts are pleaes follow href="/roadmap/indexhtml">roadmap

who uses mongock

(creds)
